1.0.7.en: fixing bug that made the app crash in som cases

1.0.9.en: Added Pergo Quickheat and changed back from Crontasks to setInterval

1.0.13.en: added availability and fixed a few bugs

2.0.0.en: - Corrected the "forEach is not a function" during pairing, Fixed so token again will be obtained from scinan.Fixed so token again will be obtained from scinan., Rework of the app, it should now work with the V2 Saswell API (Thermostat App from Saswell)Rework of the app, it should now work with the V2 Saswell API (Thermostat App from Saswell), Added two new standard devices. Scinan using API v1 and Saswell using API v2

2.0.2.en: Added repair device for saswell api

2.0.3.en: corrected repair template for saswell api

2.1.0.en: Repair capabilities added, timeline notification in case of need to migrate

2.1.4.en: changed how api call works depending on device

2.1.6.en: added imei hashing, fixed so error fires one time.

2.2.0.en: Devices now turns unavilable if there is errors

2.2.2.en: added checks if token has expired

2.2.3.en: device should now not try to make API calls if credentials are wrong or missing, resulting in IP block by Saswell

2.2.4.en: repair flag for devices on APIv1

2.3.0.en: deviceupdates to be shared by all devices - reducing uneccessary api calls to saswell

2.3.5.en: APIv2 calls are now done once for every v2 device, password and user, and refresh interval are now set in app settings

2.3.10.en: Repair, should no longer be done for every device on same driver. Token should now refresh automatically, Device discovery fixed, should only be found once. and multiple minor fixes

2.4.0.en: adding devices no longer require credentials if its already set.
